headline: Xcel Energy Inc. Board Declares Dividend on Common Stock
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, July 30, 2025--The Board of Directors of Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ: XEL) today declared a quarterly dividend on its common stock of 57 cents per share. The dividends are payable October 20, 2025, to shareholders of record on September 15, 2025.

headline: Xcel Energy Selects GridUnity for Transmission Management
summary: Xcel Energy's Public Service Company of Colorado has chosen GridUnity's GridInterConnect platform to modernize its large-generation interconnection projects and improve process efficiency.

raw.headline: Xcel Energy Selects GridUnity for Transmission Management
raw.summary: Xcel Energy's Public Service Company of Colorado has chosen GridUnity's GridInterConnect platform to modernize its large-generation interconnection projects and improve process efficiency.

headline: Xcel Energy Selects GridUnity to Modernize Transmission Interconnection in the WECC Region
summary: GridUnity, a leading provider of intelligent grid connection solutions, announced today that Xcel Energy has selected its GridInterConnect™ for Transmission platform to manage the full lifecycle of large-generation interconnection projects for Public Service Company of Colorado (PSCo). This move follows GridUnity's rapidly expanding footprint in the Western Electricity Coordinating Council (WECC) region, which spans 14 Western U.S. states and extends from Canada to Mexico.
